mapper.select: select nvl(sum(i.amount),0) sum from imp i left join merchant m on i.merchant_uid = m.merchant_uid where i.is_canceled = 0 and trunc(m.order_date) = trunc(sysdate)
select nvl(sum(i.amount),0) sum from imp i left join merchant m on i.merchant_uid = m.merchant_uid where i.is_canceled = 0 and extract(month from m.order_date) = extract(month from sysdate)
select nvl(count(*),0) cnt from member where trunc(enroll_date) = trunc(sysdate)
select nvl(count(*),0) cnt from member where black_yn = 'Y'
select count(*) cnt from question_product where question_ref_no is null
select count(*) cnt from community where extract(year from enroll_date) = extract(year from sysdate)

select to_char(b.dt, 'MM-DD') AS orderdate, nvl(SUM(a.sum), 0) sum from (select to_char(m.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as orderdate, sum(i.amount) sum from imp i left join merchant m on i.merchant_uid = m.merchant_uid where i.is_canceled = 0 and m.order_date between trunc(sysdate, 'month') and last_day(sysdate) group by m.order_date ) a, (select trunc(sysdate, 'month') + level - 1 as dt from dual connect by level <= (last_day(sysdate) - trunc(sysdate, 'month') + 1) ) b where to_char(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = a.orderdate(+) group by b.dt order by b.dt

select a.product_category pc, nvl(sum(a.buy_count),0) sum from (select substr(pd.product_code, 1,2) product_category, (select md.buy_count from merchant_detail md where md.detail_no = pd.detail_no) buy_count from product_detail pd) a group by a.product_category
select sum(decode(cs_status, 'COM', 1,0)) as com from merchant WHERE extract(month from order_date) = extract(month from sysdate)

select sum(decode(cs_status,'RET',1,0)) as ret, sum(decode(cs_status,'EXC',1,0)) as exc, sum(decode(cs_status,'CAN',1,0)) as can from order_log where extract(month from req_date) = extract(month from sysdate)

select b.mm as enrolldate ,nvl(count(a.cnt), 0) cnt from (select to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM') enrolldate, count(*) cnt from community where enroll_date between to_date(extract(year from sysdate)||'01', 'YYYYMM') and to_date(extract(year from sysdate)||'12', 'YYYYMM') group by enroll_date) a, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(extract(year from sysdate)||'01', 'YYYYMM'), level - 1), 'YYYY-MM') as mm from dual connect by level <= months_between(to_date(extract(year from sysdate)||'12', 'YYYYMM'), to_date(extract(year from sysdate)||'01', 'YYYYMM') ) + 1) b where b.mm = a.enrolldate(+) group by b.mm order by b.mm
